conversations.content: I have many items in my cart and want to clear out everything except for the electric toothbrush. Please remove the other items and place the order.

<|Function_Thought|>
The cart contains three items: a TechBrand Wireless Mouse, a Backpack, and an Electric Toothbrush. We need to remove the Wireless Mouse and the Backpack, while keeping the Electric Toothbrush, and then proceed to checkout with the remaining item.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[cart_remove_product(product_id="P001")]<|/Function_Call|>
Product ID P001 removed from cart.

<|Function_Thought|>
The TechBrand Wireless Mouse has been successfully removed from the cart. Now, I will proceed to remove the Backpack before checking out the Electric Toothbrush.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[cart_remove_product(product_id="P017")]<|/Function_Call|>
Product ID P017 removed from cart.

<|Function_Thought|>
The Backpack has been successfully removed from the cart. Now the cart only contains the Electric Toothbrush. I will proceed to checkout this item.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[checkout_selected_cart(product_ids=["P011"])]<|/Function_Call|>
Please verify your account to proceed the checkout. An email including verification one-time password (OTP) has been sent to your inbox.
To proceed with the checkout, you need to verify your account using the one-time password (OTP) sent to your email. Please check your email for the OTP and provide it here.
